trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract base class for binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.
trans-unit.target: Define a classe base abstrata para elementos usados para criar objetos de resolvedor de pares de associação.

trans-unit.source: This class defines the abstract base class for all binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe define a classe base abstrata para todos os elementos de associação usado para criar objetos de resolvedor de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: For specific implementations of this class, please see the documentation for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Para implementações específicas dessa classe, consulte a documentação <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância padrão do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> class by duplicating the provided <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"> </xref> classe duplicando fornecido <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> object to copy when creating this class instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref>objeto a ser copiado durante a criação desta instância de classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a peer resolver object with the settings defined on this binding element.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto do resolvedor de ponto a ponto com as configurações definidas neste elemento de associação.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolver"></xref> object that is used to perform peer name to address resolution.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolver"></xref>objeto que é usado para executar o nome do par de resolução de endereço.

trans-unit.source: The settings on the peer resolver must be defined on the binding element.
trans-unit.target: As configurações no resolvedor peer devem ser definidas no elemento de associação.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the referral policy for peer resolvers created with binding elements created by implementations of this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define a política de referência de ponto a ponto resolvedores criados com elementos criados pelas implementações dessa classe de associação.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the referral policy for peer resolvers created with this binding element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy"></xref>valor de enumeração que especifica a diretiva de referência para o resolvedor peer criado com esse elemento de associação.
